name: Is This True?! My Cute Kouhai Is In Love With Me!
name_original: Is This True?! My Cute Kouhai Is In Love With Me!
description:
Is This True?! My Cute Kouhai Is In Love With Me! is a game developed by rachelwang. It was originally released in 2018.
Is This True?! My Cute Kouhai Is In Love With Me! is available on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
